Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $640,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 8/11/1985...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/2/1989, off Mario Soto (LAD)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Atlanta on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: P Hipolito Pichardo. Going to ATL: P John Henry Johnson)...
8/3/1990: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $4,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
